name: Cube Runner 2
description:
Cube Runner 2 is a 3d action and puzzle platformer that's simple to learn, exciting to play, and deep enough to challenge even the greatest gamers.
This fast paced game is soul crushing, but compelling and addictive. Enjoy the blistering speed and brutal physicality, hurtle forward and master the moves. Using your reflexes while combining them with the right timing is the key to beat the game!
Prepare for impossible challenges and push your skills to the limit.
Use your wits and puzzle-solving skills to dodge and destroy the obstacles and
advance through the game.
Resist the gravity, switch dimensions in the right moment and survive as long as you can.

Why choose Cube Runner 2?
- Fast-paced and simple core gameplay
- 75 challenging levels to complete
- Competitive and exciting
- Perfectly balanced and fun to play with friends
- Easy to Learn, Fun to Master
- Achievements and rewards
